forgotPasswordScreen.passwordResetText: Enter your email below to receive your password reset instructions
forgotPasswordScreen.successMessage: An email has been sent to you with password reset instructions.

surveyAgreementScreen.welcomeSubtext: A personalized report will be just crafted for you! Simply take:
surveyAgreementScreen.declarationMessage: I, hereby consent to the use of my personal data, profile, picture and clinical details related to my person.
surveyAgreementScreen.declarationMessage2: I, declare that all my survey answers are credible.
surveyAgreementScreen.agreeCheckBoxText: I agree with the above terms, and I am willing to complete with survey. I consent with my personal data being processed as described.
surveyAgreementScreen.checkBoxError: Please select the checkbox before continuing.

skintypeScreen.errorConnectivity: Something went wrong while fetching skin type. Kindly check your internet connection or try again.
skintypeScreen.noQuestionnaireError: We could not find your survey results. Kindly try again or contact beauty salon staff.

questionnaireScreen.noOptionSelectedAlertMessage: Please select at least one option to continue.
questionnaireScreen.questionnaireFetchError: Something went wrong while fetching survey. Kindly check your internet connection or try again.

signupScreen.emailExists: User with the email already exists. Please try again.
signupScreen.emailSubtext: Please fill in your email address for receiving your latest skin analysis report.
signupScreen.invalidPasswordError: Password should be at least 5 characters long.
signupScreen.surveyAnalysisFailure: Something went wrong while processing the questionnaire. Please contact support.
signupScreen.skipBodyText: All the result would be lost. To take full advantage of our personalized skin care and recommendations, please sign up.

imagingScreen.successMessage: Your images are uploaded Successfully. Please wait a while for your report.
imagingScreen.failureMessage: Your images failed to upload. Kindly check your connection or try again later.
imagingScreen.failureMessageQuota: Your image quota has been reached. Kindly contact salon staff to top-up.
imagingScreen.partialSuccessMessageQuota: Not all images could be uploaded due to insufficient quota. Please wait a while for your report.
